CustomField.description: Total Contract Value. When products have individual terms set, TCV is calculated per-product by the trigger (stored in TCV__c). Otherwise falls back to ACV × Term / 12.
CustomField.formula: IF( TCV__c > 0, TCV__c, IF( OR(ISBLANK(Term__c), ISBLANK(ACV__c)), NULL, ACV__c * (Term__c / 12) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total Contract Value. When products have individual terms, TCV is calculated per-product (each product ACV × its own term in months / 12). When no per-product terms are set, falls back to ACV × Term / 12.
CustomField.label: TCV (Calculated)
